headline: Axon Takes Aim At AI Fears, Targets $6 Billion In 2028 Sales
summary: Axon Enterprise blew away fourth-quarter estimates after Tuesday's close and set a target for more than doubling sales over the next three years. Axon stock, which lost half its value amid worry that AI will disrupt software vendors, surged after hours.

raw.headline: Axon Takes Aim At AI Fears, Targets $6 Billion In 2028 Sales

headline: Axon Enterprise beats fourth-quarter profit estimates, shares rise
summary: Taser-maker Axon Enterprise beat Wall Street estimates for fourth-quarter profit on Tuesday, driven ‌by strong demand for its security devices and ‌software products. Shares of the Arizona-based company were up 15% in extended ​trading. Best known for its law enforcement technologies such as TASER energy weapons, body-worn cameras and digital evidence management systems, Axon has benefited from rising corporate spending on executive ‌security and increased federal ⁠investment in immigration enforcement.

headline: Axon (NASDAQ:AXON) Beats Expectations in Strong Q4 CY2025, Stock Jumps 15.1%
summary: Self defense company AXON (NASDAQ:AXON) beat Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q4 CY2025, with sales up 38.5% year on year to $796.7 million. The company’s full-year revenue guidance of $6 billion at the midpoint came in 74.4% above analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.15 per share was 34.5% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Axon: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: AXON) on Tuesday reported fourth-quarter net income of $2.7 million. On a per-share basis, the Scottsdale, Arizona-based company said it had net income of 3 cents. Earnings, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, came to $2.15 per share.

headline: Wall Street Analysts Think Axon (AXON) Is a Good Investment: Is It?
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), Axon (AXON) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?
